title: Coleslaw
description: A fantastic healthy side dish, which goes with pretty much anything
instructions: Cut up the red cabbage into sections and individually blend in a food processor until nicely chopped. Transfer the red cabbage to a large mixing bowl and add in the chopped red onion.
Mix in sour cream, mayonnaise, tarragon, balsamic vinegar & stevia.
With a spatula, mix well and serve.
